name: Unknown Skies - A 3D Platformer
description:
Venture into an unexplored world in Unknown Skies, a 3D Platformer game where you must find as much treasure as possible in this wonderfully strange, floating land.

Instructions:

To Start - Left-Click on the screen

To Quit - Either press the 'Quit' button in the Main Menu, press Alt+F4, or press the Windows button and manually close the application.

Keyboard Info:

W - Forward

S - Backward

A - Left

D - Right

Camera - Move Cursor
